bookings.title: Music Concert
bookings.description: A musical night filled with classical melodies and vibrant performances.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets available via the Opera House box office, official website, or authorized vendors. Advance booking recommended.
bookings.transportation_info: Best reached by car or taxi; limited street parking. Nearest metro station: Opera/City Center (walk 10-15 min).
reviews: Amazing performance and excellent acoustics — seating was comfortable and well organized.
Beautiful night but the queue for entry was long. Worth going for the artists' lineup.

bookings.title: Abu Simbel Sun Festival
bookings.description: Witness the magical alignment of the sun at Abu Simbel temple.
bookings.visit_hours: Early morning alignment event — usually 05:30 - 08:30 depending on the season
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets via official tourism operators or event organizers; special guided packages available.
bookings.transportation_info: Access by guided bus or private transfer from Aswan. Flights to Aswan then 3-hour drive; boat/ferry options vary seasonally.
reviews: A unique experience — seeing the sun alignment was breathtaking.
Logistics are a bit tiring (long travel), but the site and the moment are unforgettable.

bookings.title: Alexandria Lighthouse Tour
bookings.description: A historic journey exploring the remnants of the ancient lighthouse.
bookings.visit_hours: Tours typically run 09:00 - 16:00; check specific tour times.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book through local tour operators or museum ticket desks. Group discounts often available.
bookings.transportation_info: Easily accessible by taxi or public bus within Alexandria; central meeting point near the Corniche.
reviews: Informative tour with a knowledgeable guide — great for history lovers.
Nice views of the coast and good photo opportunities.

bookings.title: Sound & Light at the Pyramids
bookings.description: Enjoy a spectacular sound and light show at the Giza Pyramids.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets available online through the official site, at the venue ticket booth, or via travel agencies.
bookings.transportation_info: Recommended by taxi or tour bus; official parking available. Avoid peak traffic times.
reviews: The show is magical and the narration adds a lot of value.
Seating could be improved but the lights and history narration were excellent.

bookings.title: Nile Sunset Cruise
bookings.description: Relax with a scenic sunset cruise along the Nile River.
bookings.visit_hours: Usually departs late afternoon for a 2-3 hour sunset cruise (16:30 - 19:30).
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book via cruise operators, hotels in Luxor, or on-site at the dock. Some include dinner.
bookings.transportation_info: Most hotels offer pickup; otherwise taxi to Luxor Nile dock area.
reviews: Beautiful sunset views and relaxing atmosphere.
Crew was friendly, food was good. Highly recommended for a calm evening.

bookings.title: Aswan Spice Market Experience
bookings.description: Explore the vibrant colors and aromas of Aswan’s spice market.
bookings.visit_hours: Open daily; peak market activity 09:00 - 13:00 and late afternoon 16:00 - 19:00.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Free to enter; guided market tours bookable through local guides or tour desks.
bookings.transportation_info: Short taxi ride from Aswan city center; walkable from riverside hotels.
reviews: So many colors and friendly vendors — great place to buy local spices.
Bargaining is expected; bring cash and small bills.

bookings.title: Siwa Oasis Safari
bookings.description: Discover the remote beauty of Siwa in a guided safari tour.
bookings.visit_hours: Full-day or multi-day safari options; typical start 06:00 with flexible end times.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book with adventure operators; price may include transfers, guide and some meals.
bookings.transportation_info: Remote location — usually reached by 4x4 from Marsa Matruh or via private transfer; internal transfers arranged by operator.
reviews: A truly remote and beautiful experience — guides were knowledgeable.
Hard to reach but completely worth it for the landscapes and stars.

bookings.title: Khan El Khalili Bazaar Walk
bookings.description: Walk through Cairo’s historic market and experience local culture.
bookings.visit_hours: Market open during daytime and evening hours; best walking tours run 10:00 - 14:00 or 17:00 - 21:00.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Walking tours bookable through local tour companies; entrance to market is free.
bookings.transportation_info: Accessible by taxi or metro (close to Al-Azhar/Cairo Citadel area).
reviews: A bustling bazaar with great souvenirs and local flavor.
Be ready to haggle — vendors are persistent but friendly.

bookings.title: Camel Ride by the Pyramids
bookings.description: Enjoy a camel ride with views of the majestic pyramids.
bookings.visit_hours: Rides available throughout the day; best at sunrise or sunset for photos.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book through tour operators or vendors at the Giza plateau. Confirm price and duration before starting.
bookings.transportation_info: Reachable by taxi or organized tour buses; parking and drop-off near the plateau.
reviews: Fantastic photo opportunities and memorable experience.
Negotiate the price beforehand to avoid surprises.

bookings.title: Egyptian Museum Guided Tour
bookings.description: Guided tour showcasing ancient Egyptian artifacts and treasures.
bookings.visit_hours: Museum open 09:00 - 17:00; guided tours often scheduled in morning and afternoon slots.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets via museum ticket office or official website; guided tour fees may be extra.
bookings.transportation_info: Central Cairo — accessible by taxi, ride-hailing, and some bus routes. Nearest metro: Tahrir/Cairo University area.
reviews: Incredible collection and very informative guide.
Expect crowds; allow several hours to fully explore.

bookings.title: Red Sea Snorkeling Adventure
bookings.description: Dive into the Red Sea and explore colorful coral reefs.
bookings.visit_hours: Excursions typically depart in the morning (08:00 - 12:00) and afternoon options available.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book through dive centers or tour operators; equipment rental often included.
bookings.transportation_info: Hurghada accessible by flight or road; most hotels offer transfer to the marina.
reviews: Stunning coral and abundant fish life — great guides and safety standards.
Water was clear and the boat crew was professional.

bookings.title: Luxor Temple Night Visit
bookings.description: Visit Luxor Temple under the stars in a magical night setting.
bookings.visit_hours: Night visits generally from 18:00 - 22:00; check seasonal times.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets available at the site; guided night tours bookable through agencies.
bookings.transportation_info: Most visitors arrive from Luxor city center by taxi or hotel transfer.
reviews: Beautifully lit and atmospheric at night — highly recommended.
Guides provide great historical context; bring a light jacket after dark.

bookings.title: Saint Catherine Hiking Trip
bookings.description: Climb Mount Sinai and witness a breathtaking sunrise.
bookings.visit_hours: Night climb recommended for sunrise viewing; typical schedule starts around 02:00 - 03:00.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Book via trekking companies or monasteries that arrange guides and permits.
bookings.transportation_info: Transfer from Sharm El-Sheikh or Dahab; organized transport often included in packages.
reviews: The sunrise from the summit is unforgettable — tough but rewarding.
Guide and mule support made the climb manageable. Bring warm clothes for the top.

bookings.title: Philae Temple Sound & Light
bookings.description: Enjoy a sound and light spectacle at Philae Temple.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets via the show organizer or local tour providers; advance booking advised.
bookings.transportation_info: Access via boat from Aswan; many tours include the transfer.
reviews: A magical atmosphere with great storytelling and lights.
Boat ride added to the charm — well organized.

bookings.title: Cairo International Book Fair
bookings.description: Explore thousands of titles and cultural events at the annual book fair in Cairo.
bookings.visit_hours: Daily hours usually 10:00 - 20:00 during the fair period.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets commonly sold at venue entrances and online; special events may require separate registration.
bookings.transportation_info: Major venue with good transport links — metro, buses and taxis recommended; allow time for crowds.
reviews: Huge selection of books and many cultural events — a booklover's paradise.
Very crowded on weekends; go early for a more relaxed visit.

bookings.title: Downtown Contemporary Arts Festival
bookings.description: A vibrant festival celebrating performing and visual arts in Cairo’s downtown.
bookings.visit_hours: Festival events across the day and evening; main performances 17:00 - 23:00.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Tickets via festival website, box offices, and selected partners. Some events free.
bookings.transportation_info: Central location — best by metro or taxi; expect pedestrian zones and road closures during festival days.
reviews: Fantastic mix of contemporary performances and street art.
Great vibe but some venues are small — arrive early for popular shows.

bookings.title: Tour d’Égypte (Cycling Race)
bookings.description: A major international cycling event covering scenic routes across Egypt.
bookings.visit_hours: Stages run during daytime hours; exact schedule varies by stage.
bookings.ticket_purchase_info: Spectating is generally free; official hospitality packages and team passes available via organizers.
bookings.transportation_info: Stages held across multiple regions; local transport and shuttle information provided by organizers per stage.
reviews: Exciting atmosphere with great support from local crowds.
Well organized; good for cycling fans and families.

history.title: Mövenpick Resort
history.visit_hours: Check-in from 14:00, check-out by 12:00; facilities open 07:00 - 23:00.
history.ticket_purchase_info: Bookings via hotel website or travel agents. Special packages sometimes available.
history.transportation_info: Accessible from Aswan airport with hotel transfer options.
reviews: Excellent service and comfortable rooms with great Nile views.
Food options were varied and the pool area was relaxing.

history.title: Khufu’s Restaurant
history.visit_hours: Opening hours typically 12:00 - 23:00; special dinner service in the evening.
history.ticket_purchase_info: Reservations recommended for evenings; book via phone or restaurant website.
history.transportation_info: Short taxi ride from central Giza or hotels near the plateau.
reviews: Fantastic food with a view — great for special occasions.
Service was attentive though a bit pricey for the area.
